item.title: Golf Ball Mystery
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: The street gutter outside of my house has an odd mystery. There is what appears to be a golf ball in the cement: It is common to see initials or hand prints in cement, but this is the only time I’ve seen a golf ball in cement. My neighborhood is nearly 30 years old, so […]
item.content:encoded:
The street gutter outside of my house has an odd mystery. There is what appears to be a golf ball in the cement:

It is common to see initials or hand prints in cement, but this is the only time I’ve seen a golf ball in cement. My neighborhood is nearly 30 years old, so I’m assuming it has been in the cement that whole time. No idea how or why it ended up in there.

This is what came to mind when trying to figure it out:
